SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_MOUNTAIN ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() local total = (filter:Count()) local target_creature = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) local target_player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end if ( target_creature ~= nil ) then target_creature:DealDamage(total, source) elseif ( target_player ~= nil ) then target_player:DealDamage(total, source) end
